name: AhoyMaps
summary: The AhoyMaps iOS SDK is built to provide seamless integration of Map functionalities into your app
description:
The features of AhoyMaps are
* Display a Map with zoom and pan functionality
* Add markers to the map
* Add a polyline
* Add a polygon
* Load custom themes(Day/Night) etc
